description: I'm a full-stack developer with experience in building web applications using modern technologies.

about.description: Back in 2019, I decided to try my hand at creating web applications and dove into the world of coding and web development. Nowadays, I’ve had the privilege of building software for different clients. Currently, my main goal is to create accessible user interfaces while making the most of modern technologies. What I enjoy the most is creating software that sits right at the intersection of design and engineering—things that look good but are also well-crafted. In my free time, I also like to explore the server-side universe, bringing together attractive interfaces with best practices in data management. When I'm not in front of the computer, I enjoy reading, spending time with my wife, or running along the beach.

items.title: Intehbel: Stop Dreaming and let us make it happen.
items.description: Develop components used to build the platform's user interface. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers and designers.

items.title: DSpot: We are Developers Designers DSpot a digital company.
items.description: Develop components used to build the platform's user interface. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers and designers.

items.title: Remake: Video Versioning and Content Localization.
items.description: Develop APIs with Node.js to integrate user interfaces with different services. Manage services responsible for creating/updating Adobe PS and Adobe AE projects, as well as rendering Adobe AE projects. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers and designers.

items.title: Findr: The business matching platform for decision-makers.
items.description: Develop and maintain critical components used to build the platform's user interface. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and product managers, to implement and promote best practices in web accessibility.

cv.description: Experienced software engineer with a focus on building engaging & accessible digital experiences.

general: Build, style, and ship high·quality websites, design systems, and cross platform digital experiences for a diverse array of clients using technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, CSS, and more.
Work alongside product & project managers, designers, and other engineers to transform creative concepts into refined digital experiences at an agile (2 week) cadence.
Provide leadership within engineering department through close collaboration, building tools to improve developer experience, and mentorship.
details:
Findr platform 2019 - 2021
  • Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client website primarily using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript.
  • Performed quality assurance tests on site to ensure cross browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
  • Performed e2e testing on site to ensure proper functioning of views.

Remake platform 2021 - 2022
  • Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client website primarily using JavaScript, Express, Adobe Ps, Adobe Ae.
  • Performed unit tests on Backend to ensure proper functioning of the different services.
  • Contributed extensively to the creation of the application SDK.

DSpot website 2022 - 2023
  • Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client website primarily using React, TypeScript, HTML, CSS.
  • Performed quality assurance tests on site to ensure cross browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
  • Implemented stories with Storybook to guarantee the design of each component.

Intehbel website 2023 - 2024
  • Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client website primarily using Laravel, PHP, HTML, CSS, Javascript.

Dabl 2024 - Present
  • Developed, maintained and shipped production code for client website that primarily use TypeScript.
  • Developed driver for communication between the navigator and medical equipment.
